pradhana dorin niwesata athuluwana witama wiwrutha muluthangeya salaya thula thibima, padi kipayak dama polowa osawa niwesa idikirima, shithala deshagunaya nisa biththi saha wahalaya wada us nokirima, unusuma niwese randimata idikarana udun, dawayen ho kalugalin nimakarana biththi, hima aadiya no randimata wadi aanathiyakata sadana wahalaya, karyayan kipayak wenuwen salasum karagath niwesa athulatha pihiti awakashayan yanadi karunu bohomayak apata galapena paridi salasumwala di sanshodhanaya wiya yuthuyi.

kolambaa pradhana pele redi pili alewi samagam samuhayaka ayithikaru badugewima mangaharima sandaha siya aayathanawala labhaya wishala washayen nithiwirodhi lesa indiyawata yawima pilibandawa purna wimarshanayak pawathwana lesa kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath gihan pilapitiya mahatha rahas polisiyata niyoga keleya.rupiyal laksha 72ka mudalak wanchakirima ha agaru chekpathak nikuth kirima sambandhayen ema samagamwala sewaya kala kalamanakaruwakuta erehiwa idiripath kara thibu paminillak pilibandawa adhikaranaya hamuwe idiripath wu karunu salaka bala mema niyogaya kala pradhana mahesthrathwaraya nithiwirodhi lesa meratin mudal bahara karana kramayak wana undiyal kramayata sidukarana mulya wanchawa gana pawathwana wimarshanayata shri lanka maha bankuwe sahaya laba ganna lesa da niyama keleya.redipili wyapariyaku kala paminillak matha ohuge samagamwala sewaya kala ee.

ee anuwa, yuddha hamudadhipathi thumange mangapenwima matha ‘pibidemu polonnaruwa’ wyapruthiye wyapruthi adhyaksha brigediyar chandana wijesundarage adhikshanaya yatathe siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwe samajikayin saha yuddha hamuda bhata piris wisin badada (31) dina wiwidha pasi saha jalaja palatiwalin grahanawa pawathi mema wawa pirisidu kirime katayuthu arambai athara nagenahira aarakshaka sena aagnyapathige upades paridi yuddha hamuda yanthra suthra da me sandaha yoda ganna ladi.

janadhipathi lekam karyalayedi pawathwanu labu ema sakachchawata pakshaye maha lekam dayasiri jayasekara, pakshaye wruththiya samithi lekam lasantha alagiyawanna, shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaye pradhana lekam lesli dewendra, wruththiya samithi katayuthu pilibanda janadhipathi sambandhikarana lekam dushmantha, eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye maha lekam parlimenthu manthri mahinda amarawira athulu pirisak sahabhagi wi sitiyaha.
